alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 21 at 6:56AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...NEAR WHITEOUT CONDITIONS FROM ANTELOPE FLATS ON HIGHWAY 26 TO THE RIVER RIM REGION ALONG HIGHWAY 33 EAST OF NEWDALE... At 650 AM MST, strong winds with areas of blowing snow and significantly reduced visibility were noted on webcams from Antelope Flats on Highway 26 north to the River Rim area along Highway 33 east of Newdale. Motorists traveling in this region this morning should be prepared for dangerous winter travel conditions with near whiteout conditions at times. Improving conditions will follow later this afternoon. Watch for updates on conditions through the morning. Locations impacted include... Driggs, Swan Valley, Ririe Reservoir, Felt, Palisades Reservoir, Victor, Tetonia, Irwin, Tetonia Research Station, Green Canyon Hot Springs and Pine Creek Pass. Visibilities are below one quarter of a mile in this area of blowing snow. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Blackfoot Mountains; Caribou Range; Centennial Mountains, Island Park; Teton Valley; Upper Snake River Plain
